com.se.simplicity.engine
Interface CompositeEngine

All Superinterfaces:
Engine, java.lang.Runnable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleCompositeEngine
public interface CompositeEngine
extends Engine

An Engine that is composed of several sub-engines. The CompositeEngine manages how the sub-engines are run.

Author:
Gary Buyn

Method Summary
 void addEngine(Engine engine)
           Adds an Engine to the set of engines managed by this CompositeEngine.
 void removeEngine(Engine engine)
           Removes an Engine from the set of engines managed by this CompositeEngine.

advance, destroy, getPreferredFrequency, init, reset, setPreferredFrequency
 
Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Runnable
run
